name: Yesha Dave
biography: My name is Yesha. I have done my undergrad in Information technology from Pune University, India.  I am having 3 years of work experience in software development with a company named Persistent Systems. Currently I am doing my masters in computer Science and this is my second semester at Stevens. I live in JErsey City with my husband. He is a stevens Alumni and a software developer in Citigroup.
favoriteShows: 1. F.R.I.E.N.D.S - This is my all time favourite TV show, I would rank it as 10/10.
How I met your mother - Rank 7.5/10
